articles.content: NEW DELHI: Noise and Wings have launched their latest true wireless stereo (TWS) earbuds in India, the Air Buds 2 and Phantom 200, at Rs 1,799 and Rs 999, respectively. The Noise Air Buds 2 features … [+1118 chars]

articles.title: Intel Core i9-13900K and Core i5-13600K review: The beast and the mid-tier champion - Moneycontrol
articles.description: Intel improves upon Alder Lake to give Raptor Lake a unique flavor of its own
articles.content: Codenamed Raptor Lake, Intel's 13th Generation processors build on the foundation laid out by Alder Lake, the previous generation Intel silicon that put the company back in the fight against Team Red… [+6830 chars]
